nodes.text: Sheg-knuckles were objects which could be rolled. Some patrons of the Alcazar cantina on the planet Akiva were gambling on the outcome of rolling sheg-knuckles when the former Imperial Sinjir Rath Velus visted the establishment several months after the Battle of Endor.
Sheg-knuckles first appeared in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
